entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 10:11 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
